Room.Name: Necropolis Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the west leg of the Necropolis path, circling the grounds.
Room.LongDescription: There is a footpath leading north to a cemetery through an iron gate, which has been left open. The path on the other side of the gate is only a dirt path, slightly overgrown now with grass, but it is not poorly kept. You see signs of loving care at some of the grave sites.
